message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,000. It's a great deal and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $7,500 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $8,500. This still leaves room for both of us to be happy with the deal. Let's make this happen!
I'm getting close to my budget, so I'm willing to meet you at $8,000. Is this a deal?
